headline: MSCI to Participate in Barclays Global Financial Services Conference; Publishes Investor Presentation
summary: NEW YORK, August 18, 2025--MSCI Inc. ("MSCI" or the "Company") (NYSE: MSCI), a global connector of the financial ecosystem helping clients navigate risk and opportunity through data, models and research-based insights, announced today that Chief Financial Officer Andrew Wiechmann will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference on Monday, September 8, 2025 at 12:00 PM Eastern Time.
